name: Transit

aliases.name: Timeline
aliases.type: { exitDuration : Float, msg : msg, enterDuration : Float }

aliases.name: WithTransition
aliases.comment: Extended type for the parent model holding the transition.

types.name: Msg
types.comment: Transition msg, to be wrapped in your own msg type.

types.name: Step
types.comment: Transition step: Exit -> *send message* -> Enter -> Done.

types.name: Transition
types.comment: Opaque type for transition state storage.

values.name: defaultTimeline
values.comment: Default timeline for this transition: exit of 50ms then enter of 200ms.

values.name: getValue
values.comment: Extract current animation value (a float between 0 and 1).

values.name: initial
values.comment: Empty transition state, as initial value in the model.

values.name: start
values.comment:
Start the transition with the following parameters:

* `tagger` to wrap Transit's Msg into your app's Msg type (consistent with `tick` signature, saves you one `Cmd.map`)
* `timeline` to setup transition
* `parent` is the model storing the Transition, to update with new transition state

Returns a tuple that you can directly emit from your `update`.
values.type: (Transit.Msg -> msg) -> Transit.Timeline msg -> Transit.WithTransition parent msg -> ( Transit.WithTransition parent msg, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

values.name: subscriptions
values.comment: Animation frame subscription. Must be called by your component's subscription function.
values.type: (Transit.Msg -> msg) -> Transit.WithTransition parent msg -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg

values.name: tick
values.comment:
Where all the logic happens. Run transition steps, and triggers timeline's parent message when needed.

* `tagger` to wrap Transit's msg into app's Msg type, has to be same type of timeline.msg,
* `msg` is the Transit message to process,
* `parent` is the model storing the Transition, for transition state update.
values.type: (Transit.Msg -> msg) -> Transit.Msg -> Transit.WithTransition parent msg -> ( Transit.WithTransition parent msg, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

values.name: timeline
values.comment:
Build the timeline:
> exitDuration => message => enterDuration
